statements: SELECT * FROM media_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM media_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT release_title, release_date FROM press_releases ORDER BY release_date DESC;

SELECT release_title, release_date, SUBSTRING(release_content, 1, 50) AS extracted_content FROM press_releases WHERE release_id = 3;
